alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lanier and central Lowndes Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near I-75 At Exit 16, or near Valdosta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Lakeland, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Greenwood, Twin Lakes, Hansell, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 11, Stockton and I-75 At Exit 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
